hero.title: Our Vision, Mission &
hero.subtitle: The foundation that shapes Altama Surya Anugerah in creating and growing.

vision.label: Vision
vision.description: To be a trusted distributor in Indonesia for technical, automotive, and industrial equipment, providing high-quality products that support professionals, entrepreneurs, and households.

mission.label: Mission
items: Supporting the needs of the community, professionals, and industries.
Expanding distribution networks to make products accessible throughout Indonesia.
Continuously improving innovation and expansion in line with market developments.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: Working together for a common purpose.

2011.description: Altama was founded in Jakarta, starting its journey as a technical distributor.

2015.description: Expanded distribution network to more major cities.

2018.description: Added new products: Tekiro Handtools, RYU Power Tools, Rexco Chemicals.

2020.description: National distribution strengthened + modern market expansion improved.

hero.title: Awards &
hero.subtitle: Leadership driving Altama's growth and excellence

awardRecognition.title: Award Recognition
awardRecognition.description: This award reinforces Altama's position as a national distributor with a trusted brand strength in Indonesia.

internationalStandard.title: International Standard:
internationalStandard.description: This certification ensures all of Altama's business processes meet international quality standards and focus on customer satisfaction.

hero.title: Board Of
hero.subtitle: Leadership driving Altama's growth and excellence

director1.name: Oscar Andrew Sutjadi
director1.title: Director, PT Altama Surya Anugerah
director1.description1: Oscar Andrew Sutjadi is the Director of PT Altama Surya Anugerah, playing a key role in directing business strategy and company development as a national distributor of technical, automotive, and industrial equipment.
director1.description2: He focuses on strengthening distribution networks, developing the Tekiro, RYU, and Rexco brands, and ensuring the company's growth runs sustainably while maintaining quality and professionalism.

director2.name: Stephanus Ferdinand Santoso
director2.title: Vice Director, PT Altama Surya Anugerah
director2.description1: Stephanus Ferdinand Santoso serves as Vice Director of PT Altama Surya Anugerah with primary responsibility for operational management and organizational effectiveness improvement.
director2.description2: With a background in engineering and management, he plays a role in maintaining quality standards, optimizing work processes, and supporting company growth through efficient and sustainable systems.

hero.title: Moments from
hero.subtitle: Documentation of Altama's activities, work culture, and journeys.

insights.title: Insights, Innovation, and Progress
insights.subtitle: Find the best solutions for your technical, automotive, and industrial needs.

hero.title: GROW TOGETHER
hero.subtitle: Your partner in progress, empowering every step toward Indonesia's success.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What our partners say about Altama

1.quote: Altama consistently provides quality products with timely distribution. Their team is professional and easy to work with.
1.name: Andi Pratama

3.quote: Tekiro and RYU products from Altama greatly help our operations. Quality is guaranteed and their after-sales service is excellent.
3.name: Siti Nurhaliza

4.quote: Altama has become a trusted partner in providing industrial equipment with consistent quality standards.
4.name: Dianne Russell

5.quote: Working with Altama is very transparent and structured. The distribution team support really helps us in the field.
5.name: Devon Lane

6.quote: Altama's product quality never needs to be questioned. Their after-sales service is also very satisfying and responsive.
6.name: Ronald Richards

7.quote: Partnership with Altama brings significant value to our business operations. Highly recommended!
7.name: Budi Santoso

8.quote: The Altama team is always ready to help with our needs with the right solutions and competitive prices.
8.name: Jenny Wilson

infoCard.text: Where people grow, collaborate, and make an impact.

hero.title: MEDIA CENTER
hero.subtitle: Latest news, press releases, and updates from PT Altama Surya Anugerah

1.title: Latest Technology Innovation from Altama in the Tools Industry
1.excerpt: Altama continues to innovate by introducing the latest technology in the production of high-quality tools to support Indonesia's industry.
1.author: Altama Editorial Team

2.title: Altama Wins Best Manufacturing Company 2024 Award
2.excerpt: Altama's brilliant achievement in winning the award as the best manufacturing company in 2024 from Indonesia Manufacturing Awards.
2.author: Corporate Communications

3.title: Market Expansion: Tekiro Products Reach Southeast Asia
3.excerpt: Tekiro brand from Altama is now present in various Southeast Asian countries, expanding market reach and increasing consumer trust.
3.author: Marketing Team

4.title: Altama's Commitment to Sustainability and Green Manufacturing
4.excerpt: Altama implements green manufacturing practices in the production process to maintain environmental sustainability and long-term sustainability.
4.author: Sustainability Team

5.title: Workshop Series: Enhancing Altama Employees' Skills
5.excerpt: Regular training programs organized by Altama to improve the competence and professionalism of the team across various departments.
5.author: HR Department

6.title: New Product Launch: Rexco Professional Series 2025
6.excerpt: Altama introduces the latest series from the Rexco brand with professional features designed specifically for heavy industry and construction.
6.author: Product Development
